titles: A letter from a person of quality in the north to a friend in London, concerning Bishop Lake's late declaration of his dying in the belief of the doctrine of passive obedience as the distinguishing character of the Church of England
author: Eyre, Elizabeth.
notes: Attributed to Elizabeth Eyre. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
keywords: Obedience --  Religious aspects --  Christianity --  Early works to 1800.
